bibl.bibl: Kölliker, Rudolf Albert von. 1851. Some observations upon the structure of two new species of Hectocotyle, parasitic upon Tremoctopus violaceus, D. Ch., and Argonauta argo, Linn.; with an exposition of the hypothesis that these Hectocotylæ are the males of the Cephalopoda upon which they are found. [Read 15 April and 6 May 1845.] Transactions of the Linnean Society of London 20: 9–21.
